movies.title: Navajeros
movies.plot: José Manuel Gómez Perales alias "El Jaro" lives with his band, also teenagers and their girlfriends. One day he meets Mercedes, a prostitute who want him away from the bad way. Then appears Toñi, a drug addict from which he falls .
movies.simplePlot: José Manuel Gómez Perales alias "El Jaro" lives with his band, also teenagers and their girlfriends. One day he meets Mercedes, a prostitute who want him away from the bad way. Then appears Toñi, a drug addict from which he falls .

biography.bio: José Luis Manzano was born on December 30, 1963 in Toledo, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain as José Luis Manzano Agudo. He was an actor, known for El pico 2 (1984), El pico (1983) and Navajeros (1980). He died on February 20, 1992 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: José Luis Manzano

biography.bio: The Mexican movie star Isela Vega was born in Hermosillo, Sonora, Mexico on November 5, 1939. At the age of 18, the young beauty was named Princess of the 1957 Carnaval in Hermosillo, and parlayed that into work as a model. She also had some success as a singer before turning to acting. (Her composition "Bennie's Song" was used in Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia (1974), which features her singing.) She made her film debut in the Pedro Armendáriz movie Verano violento (1960). From her beginning in small roles in Mexican films in the early 1960s, her career grew and Isela became very popular as a sex symbol in the late 1960s. (She would appear nude in a multi-page feature in Playboy Magazine's July 1974 issue.) In addition to her Mexican films, TV shows, and stage appearances, she also worked in a number of foreign films, most famously in Sam Peckinpah's _Bring Me the Head of Alfredo García_ (1974), for which she received a Best Actress Ariel Award nomination in 1975. (Previously, Vega had been nominated for a Best Actress Ariel for her turn in Las reglas del juego (1971) in 1972.) She had made her American film debut the year previously in The Deadly Trackers (1973) (the U.S.-Mexico horror cheapie Fear Chamber (1968) doesn't really count) and continued to appear occasionally in small parts in American films and TV until the late 1990s. In addition to her work as an actress, Isela Vega produced, wrote and directed Lovers of the Lord of the Night (1986), and has written and produced other films. She has a son whose father is Alberto Vázquez, and a daughter (Shaula, an actress) whose father is Jorge Luke, her co-star in _Sabor de la venganza, El (1971)_.
biography.name: Isela Vega

biography.bio: Verónica Castro was born on October 19, 1952 in Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico as Verónica Judith Sainz Castro Alva. She is an actress, known for Chiquita pero picosa (1986), Pueblo chico, infierno grande (1997) and Mi pequeña Soledad (1990).
biography.name: Verónica Castro

biography.bio: Jaime Garza was born on January 28, 1954 in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, Mexico as Jaime Francisco Garza Alardín. He is an actor, known for Distilling Love (2007), Mañana es para siempre (2008) and Missing (1982). He is married to Natalia Toledo.
biography.name: Jaime Garza

biography.bio: Enrique San Francisco was born on March 10, 1955 in Madrid, Spain as Enrique San Francisco Cobo. He is an actor, known for Cuéntame (2001), The Hit (1984) and La crisis carnívora (2007).
biography.name: Enrique San Francisco

biography.bio: María Martín was born on July 14, 1923 in Marbella, Spain as María Martín Vargas. She is an actress, known for Golden Balls (1993), Bilbao (1978) and Dawn of America (1951).
biography.name: María Martín

biography.bio: José Sacristán was born on September 27, 1937 in Chinchón, Madrid, Spain as José María Sacristán Turiégano. He is an actor and director, known for La niña de fuego (2014), A Place in the World (1992) and Éste es mi barrio (1996).
biography.name: José Sacristán

biography.placeOfBirth: Arona, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Canary Islands, Spain
biography.bio: José Manuel Cervino was born on October 29, 1940 in Arona, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Canary Islands, Spain as José Manuel Cervino Almeida. He is an actor, known for La guerra de los locos (1987), The Last Circus (2010) and Mararía (1998). He has been married to Maite Blasco since 1977.
biography.name: José Manuel Cervino

biography.bio: Ramón Reparaz was born on October 14, 1931 in San Sebastián, Spain as Ramón González Reparaz. He was an actor, known for The Priest (1978), The Creature (1977) and El diputado (1978). He was married to Mara Goyanes. He died on December 28, 2006 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Ramón Reparaz

biography.bio: Alfred Lucchetti was born on April 3, 1934 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Alfred Lucchetti Farré. He is known for his work on Poble Nou (1994), Bar-Cel-Ona (1987) and Black Candles (1982). He died on April 8, 2011 in Barcelona.
biography.name: Alfred Lucchetti

biography.bio: Alberto Mendiola is an actor, known for Navajeros (1980) and La sombra de un recuerdo (1978).
biography.name: Alberto Mendiola

biography.bio: Manuel Álvarez Serrano is an actor, known for Navajeros (1980).
biography.name: Manuel Álvarez Serrano

biography.bio: Enrique Rojas Pérez is an actor, known for Navajeros (1980).
biography.name: Enrique Rojas Pérez

biography.bio: José Luis Fernández 'Pirri' was born in 1965 in Madrid, Spain as José Luis Fernández Eguia. He was an actor, known for The Hit (1984), Sé infiel y no mires con quién (1985) and El pico 2 (1984). He died on May 9, 1988 in Madrid.
biography.name: José Luis Fernández 'Pirri'

biography.bio: Pep Corominas is an actor, known for Perversión en el paraíso (1981), Neumonía erótica y pasota (1981) and The Ages of Lulu (1990).
biography.name: Pep Corominas
